Trade/Device Name(s): BaseSens I Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BaseSens I Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a rebranded version of CareSens N for quantitative glucose measurement using amperometric method.
Indications for Use Summary: Used for quantitative measurement of glucose levels in capillary whole blood as an aid in monitoring diabetes management at home or in clinical settings; for in vitro diagnostic use only, not intended for diagnosis or screening of diabetes, nor for neonates, with alternate site testing during steady-state blood glucose conditions.
